Uses of Interface
ccacore.ComponentID

Packages that use ComponentID
ccacore   
 

Uses of ComponentID in ccacore
 

Methods in ccacore that return ComponentID
 ComponentID BuilderService.createInstance(java.lang.String instanceName, java.lang.String className, TypeMap properties)
          Creates an instance of a CCA component of the type defined by the string className.
 ComponentID Services.getComponentID()
          Get a reference to the component to which this Services object belongs.
 ComponentID BuilderService.getComponentID(java.lang.String componentInstanceName)
          Get id from name by which it was created.
 ComponentID[] BuilderService.getComponentIDs()
          Get component list.
 ComponentID BuilderService.getDeserialization(java.lang.String s)
          Get component id from stringified reference.
 ComponentID ConnectionID.getProvider()
          Get the providing component (callee) ID.
 ComponentID ConnectionID.getUser()
          Get the using component (caller) ID.
 

Methods in ccacore with parameters of type ComponentID
 ConnectionID BuilderService.connect(ComponentID user, java.lang.String usingPortName, ComponentID provider, java.lang.String providingPortName)
          Creates a connection between ports on component user and component provider.
 void BuilderService.destroyInstance(ComponentID toDie, float timeout)
          Eliminate the Component instance, from the scope of the framework.
 void BuilderService.disconnectAll(ComponentID id1, ComponentID id2, float timeout)
          Remove all connections between components id1 and id2 within the period of timeout secs.
 TypeMap BuilderService.getComponentProperties(ComponentID cid)
          Get property map for component.
 ConnectionID[] BuilderService.getConnectionIDs(ComponentID[] componentList)
          Returns a list of connections as an array of handles.
 TypeMap BuilderService.getPortProperties(ComponentID cid, java.lang.String portName)
          Fetch map of Port properties exposed by the framework.
 java.lang.String[] BuilderService.getProvidedPortNames(ComponentID cid)
          Get the names of Port instances provided by the identified component.
 java.lang.String[] BuilderService.getUsedPortNames(ComponentID cid)
          Get the names of Port instances used by the identified component.
 void BuilderService.setComponentProperties(ComponentID cid, TypeMap map)
          Causes the framework implementation to associate the given properties with the component designated by cid.
 void BuilderService.setPortProperties(ComponentID cid, java.lang.String portName, TypeMap map)
          Associates the properties given in map with the Port indicated by portname.
